title: BOP processing notes re: Coleman FOIAs

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: BOP processing notes re: Coleman FOIAs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- any internal processing notes for FOIA requests 2024-03696, 2023-03578, 2023-04820, 2023-03575, and 2024-00287.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: BOP Electronic Mortality Database 2022-2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- a copy of the HSD Electronic Mortality Database limited to entries between Aug. 1 2022 and October 15, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

communications.subject: Arkansas Freedom of Information Act Request: Taylor Rogers request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

records related to the arrest and investigation of TAYLOR ROGERS by your agency. This occurred on or around MAY 19, 2022.

This request includes all police reports, incident reports, and supplemental reports regarding the investigation.

Please note: you may redact identifying information of all victims.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Molly Hensley-Clancy.

communications.subject: RE: Arkansas Freedom of Information Act Request: Taylor Rogers request
communications.communication:
Good Morning,

Can you please provide an address?

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Kentucky Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

request records related to the arrest and investigation of KWEN TRICE by your agency. This occurred on or around April 11, 2014.

This request includes all police reports, incident reports, and supplemental reports regarding the investigation. Please note: you may redact identifying information of all victims.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Molly Hensley-Clancy
